name: Dont Trust
description:
Don't Trust is a physics-based 2d platformer, but as mentioned in the title, you can't completely trust your environment.
Your goal is to reach the blue cube on the right.
If you can't complete  a level, you can use the blue cube on the left to go to the next one.

controls: 
a - left
d - right
space bar - jump
escape - menu

Good luck and have fun.
